alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 16 at 1:44PM CST until January 18 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Box Butte County and Scotts Bluff County. In Wyoming, Central Laramie County. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is still uncertainty in the track of this storm which could impact where the heaviest snowfall occurs.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
